website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you want to try a 3-day cleanse or just like cold-pressed juice, but you may not like all of the flavors.
pros: Made of cold pressed organic juices with nothing artificial
The individual juices don't require mixing and provide convenience and variety for a custom juice cleanse, or just a meal substitute
cons: Some of the juices taste better than others – users gripe about the taste of the green juices in particular
Falls on the higher end of the price range

customer_reviews.title: it was pretty simple and it is white pants approved
customer_reviews.text: I lost 7 lbs! I had so much energy and didn't feel hungry. It is always hard getting back into regular eating after cleanses, but with this one, it was pretty simple and it is white pants approved! I recommend starting on a weekend because as your body cleanses, you will experience headaches - just your body removing toxins. These are such great quality and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Segura

customer_reviews.title: Health in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: USDA Organic, Cold-pressured, Non-GMO ... I'm in heaven! I have to overcome a long-term medical issue and decided to detox. After many months of careful research regarding all nutrition, I know, without a doubt, I'm in for a healthy detox. It checks all the right boxes. I've examined every juice on Amazon and too many to count on the Internet; and they don't compare to this juice. This is the juice to get. July 2018 update: Getting stronger every day. Feeling great. I still have Suja in my fridge every week.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: These drinks make you feel amazing if you can stomach them
customer_reviews.text: These drinks make you feel amazing if you can stomach them. They literally made me feel great after I took them, but the taste was so bad that it took me forever to finish some of these juices. I forced myself but it was difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FRESH, Juice COLD and storage packaged “ice” still Frozen solid! Packaged very nicely ❣️
customer_reviews.text: So Fresh! Ice still frozen - juice COLD, ready to drink and freeze! Bottles much larger than in Groceries ❣️
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShop

customer_reviews.title: Cold shipped, and Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: People leaving poor reviews because of taste have obviously never tried real cold pressed juice before. These juices are amazing, and although a little pricey, you are paying for top quality. If you have a problem with the taste you are probably used to drinking sugar filled fake green juices that make you feel good about yourself because of the color but have a fraction of the health benefits. This stuff is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: grubbinseattle

customer_reviews.title: Good solid juice cleanse
customer_reviews.text: It is a good solid juice cleanse. I don't particularly like the cleansing process but I enjoy how good I feel at the end. I like Suja green juices because they are not as bitter as others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: How can anyone drink these?
customer_reviews.text: If I could give these juices 0 Stars, I would. With the exception of the lemon/cayenne/maple syrup juice, every single one tastes like grass + cucumber. They smell horrible and made me gag each time it went down. I followed this plan to the T... and gained 2 lbs! Be warned... this will be the worst 3-days of your juicing life!!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge De La Nuez

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT RECEIVE AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive any of the juices that are listed I got three of the exact same juice flavors for three days I am extremely upset and disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mtggirl34

customer_reviews.title: Lost weight but gross
customer_reviews.text: I lost about 5 pounds in the three days that I did this cleanse. Probably mostly water weight but I used the cleanse as a way to kick start my healthy eating and it helped. After the cleanse, I no longer wanted really sugary food; didn't want red meats...its about a month or so now and I still cannot introduce hard alcohol back in my life because it makes me sick so I guess these are all good things. But the tastes of about 2/6 of these juices are so grossss. But I think its still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Omor

customer_reviews.title: Decent experience
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to give this a try to reset and cleanse after eating poorly due to work/travel, etc. I will say that I stuck to the plan and did not consume as little as a single peanut during the 3 days so they definitely filled me up. I found most of the drinks to be too sugary and left a coating on my teeth. Didn't notice much of a difference in my physique and do not think this is an adequate weight loss technique so keep that in mind!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Was great at the previous price
customer_reviews.text: I like Suja compared to some of the other cold pressed juices on the market. They seem healthier, and have less calories and sugar. The current price of $140 is way too high though; it keeps going up too. If the price went back down to the $100-$110 range I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Apostolos

customer_reviews.title: Worst tasting Juice cleans ever!
customer_reviews.text: Every single flavor of juice tasted terrible, I couldn't manage to choke one full bottle down, and I have had to live off of MRE's. I wanted to do a safe, TASTEY, easy, healthy 3 day cleans. I didn't cheat by eating or drinking any thing else for 2 days, but I only could manage to get through 1/2 a bottle at best. I'm a healthy person, so if you want a good cleans check out Plexis or Advocare. I know they work and if you know of a better juice cleans I'm up for the challenge!
customer_reviews.author: MFisher

customer_reviews.title: This drink works!
customer_reviews.text: I got the three days pack and my favorite one was the glow! I recommended this to friends and family as well, and they love it too. MUST TRY!
customer_reviews.author: Lin N.

customer_reviews.title: This skeptic juiced!
customer_reviews.text: So, a couple of the flavors were just horrible. The 12 Essentials was the worst and Glow was a close second. With that being said, the rest weren't bad. I stuck to the three days and felt great. I lost 8 lbs and really wasn't hungry. There was one temptation on the last day but I fought it. I'm not sure I'd buy all of the juices again but may pick up a few. Great if you're looking to feel good before an event. Hoping this will jumpstart my fitness again too.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the Pine Tree
customer_reviews.text: I’m only doing four instead of five stars because one of the drinks literally tasted like a pine tree. The others were palatable, the orange one my favorite. I did loose six pounds on it so I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Bad delivery - several sickly looking juices
customer_reviews.text: I love Suja juice, but this delivery was bad. Several of the juices were discolored and tasted bad (I know separation is normal -but these were rotten/bad)
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and good energy
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by how delicious most of the juice is. I didnt feel too hungry either while doing this cleanse. Each time I felt even slight hunger pain, I was due for another juice which made it go away. Good energy too. I'll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: WexAmz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: They all tasted good expect for one of them. I love 4 pounds, had increased energy (to the point where I couldn’t fall asleep at night) and never felt hungry. It was pretty easy. I don’t feel like the results were lasting however. Didn’t change my eating habits or sugar cravings for long.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Adkisson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cleanse. Juices are bitter and hard to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cleanse. Juices are bitter and hard to get down, but you adapt to it and it is so worth it! I feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lost 5 pounds
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in a cooler with Ice packs! Taste is not so great the first day. You can literally notice your taste buds change. Also noticed it cleared my skin up. I’ve order them atleast five times. Definitely a great start to a healthy lifestyle
customer_reviews.author: de

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love Suja juices
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Suja juices! The only one I cannot drink is the beet juice. It’s horrible. It’s still worth buying this kit. I just tossed the beet juices.
customer_reviews.author: BellaCoco

customer_reviews.title: Three day detox
customer_reviews.text: It was a detox. No weight lose, but very healthy. Not hungry, but very sick of drinking the drinks by the 3rd day.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst tasting stuff I've ever had. I wish I would have listened to the reviews I read. I can barely chose most of them down. Absolutely terrible! I am a very healthy eater and do not eat processed foods and still couldn't stomach these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Good juices but well overpriced. More worth it to invest the same amount of money or slightly more in a juicer and make own juices.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Better off just having g the actual neutrient in small ...
customer_reviews.text: Mostly water. Better off just having g the actual neutrient in small shots.
customer_reviews.author: Frese Luks

customer_reviews.title: Great Jumpstart!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in a timely manner, cold packs kept the containers cold. Taste good and I am looking forward to being a repeat customer. I needed this to jump start my weight loss and healthier eating habits.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Perry

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful products
customer_reviews.text: I loved the variety and freshness of the juice provided and will order again as my journey back to healthy life continues!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Barker

customer_reviews.title: Almost made it through day one
customer_reviews.text: I am used to cleanses, but this one left me hungry. Wish there was some fiber in there and a lot less sugary fruit. The 12 essentials would not go down the second time. Maybe the mint makes it taste like medicine? Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good, works as advertised. I found it cheaper at my local grocery store tho
customer_reviews.author: Ann L.

customer_reviews.title: Very well curated 3 day cleanse assortment
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly I didn't fully avoid coffee or food entirely during the 3 day cleanse, but by the 3rd day did 'feel' healthier and fresher.....maybe a placebo, but if it works I'll take it!
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Super Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It took 10 days to get to and when I received it, the juices were just barely refrigerated. Super disappointed with the whole order.
customer_reviews.author: Molly A

customer_reviews.title: I Feel Amazing!!! Perfect Quick Cleanse
customer_reviews.text: This cleanse was quick and easy. Not sure that I could do longer than 3 days. Most of the drinks taste pretty good, The orange carrot is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Jace Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Favorite cleanse
customer_reviews.text: It was delicious and I would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: I'm confused???
customer_reviews.text: I purcahsed the 3-day fresh start but received a completely different set of juices?!?! WTF?
customer_reviews.author: Maria Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bad taste
customer_reviews.text: The juice itself is very good quality juice with no other added ingredients besides the fruit and vegetables. The only problem I had with this product was the taste, if you’re either not used to or don’t like the taste of raw vegetables and greens then this will probably be hard to get down. They all had a horrible bitter after taste that stays in your mouth forever.
customer_reviews.author: Elaina Marzullo

customer_reviews.title: All the drinks last good and lost 7 pounds
customer_reviews.text: All the drinks last good and lost 7 pounds! Love that it you can still eat raw veggies or fruit. I never went hungry.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely terrible tasting. I was able to stomach 2 of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely terrible tasting. I was able to stomach 2 of the 6 for day 1 and couldn't even force myself to try again for day 2.
customer_reviews.author: CLang

customer_reviews.title: Loved these. Delivered in a well boxed
customer_reviews.text: Loved these. Delivered in a well boxed, box and had sufficient ice packs to keep cold. Felt amazing after. Great way to re-set your body and start fresh. :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Britt

customer_reviews.title: Awful taste
customer_reviews.text: So gross!!! These are the nastiest cold pressed juices I've ever had and I buy them from all over. I seriously spit out every single flavor! I was excited about them too. Pressed juicerys are amazing and I will only stick to those from now on.
customer_reviews.author: sinfulcrystal

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The juices might be fresh but taste awful I'm just going to chew my veggies from now on. Thought it would be a good way to cleanse my body but found out it's no different than a water cleanse with the exception they cost more and have way more sugar. Natural fruit is good for you in moderation not 8 north a day. Also if you do go through with this but baby wipes and sit to it paper because use the bathroom is going to be your spot.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Graff

customer_reviews.title: expensive, but worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: this was fairly easy cleanse, and I felt amazing during and after! I received so many compliments on my hair and skin, just the results I was looking for....glowing skin and shiny hair!
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Stuff, Not Hungry while juice-ing. Snack on some organic nuts if you get the munchies!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good juice
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good juice. Arrived before scheduled, which threw me off a bit, but the juice's had an expiration date 2.5 months later so it was fine. Did three days just on these and felt refreshed and energetic the whole time. A few of them are tastier than others but I did not find myself slogging through any of them or dreading drinking after 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: C McATop Contributor: Raspberry Pi

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time adjusting to the taste, but forced myself--still don't enjoy them, but most are not too bad tasting. However, the "Desert" coconut juice is unpalatable and after one sip I dumped it down the drain. It was a good value, but probably won't reorder this product - rather will try another juice company.
customer_reviews.author: LEO808

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved all the juices! Was a bit expensive but so worth it and i feel amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Best and most consistent juice cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I do this cleanse once every few months. It's my favorite juice company and I like what they stand for. The product is consistent - you know what you're going to get. Thanks Suja!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: I dropped 5 pounds and had never felt better. I wish I could drink these for life
customer_reviews.text: I’m hoping this price drops. I dropped 5 pounds and had never felt better. I wish I could drink these for life.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the Suja Juice. I liked the variety of flavors and thought they all tasted great. You can tell the ingredients are real, fresh and healthy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: I like the taste of Jus by Julie better but this ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste of Jus by Julie better but this is good for the price, I used it for smoothies as the taste was not so much to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Z

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Some items came with expired juice dates. Took forever to ship as well.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Make your own juice or not at all
customer_reviews.text: Literally the most disgusting juices I've ever had. Did the 3 day cleanse/detox/whatever you'd prefer to call it. I followed the plan exactly as laid out. Wasn't my first time juicing. Not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy Happy
customer_reviews.text: Took awhile to arrive but worth the wait. I loved the way it was packaged and still cold when it arrived. Did the cleanse and lost 3/4 lbs, and haven't gained it back. Helped my digestive system relax too.
customer_reviews.author: sleepingbeauty03

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend as a cleanse
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this stuff really works. I was truly cleansed, I did not feel hungry unless it was time for the next drink which I did in a regiment of every 2 hours starting around 8 AM. I would recommend as a cleanse. I lost 5 pounds and have kept it off by eating salmon and sweet potatoes for two days after, drinking juice for my breakfast and I made an all vegetable soup that had tomatoes, cabbage, celery and onions with cinnamon for a spice.
customer_reviews.author: dbm23j

customer_reviews.title: This cleanse was by far the worst, the juices are far too sweet and do ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my fourth juice cleanse, all of them from different providers. This cleanse was by far the worst, the juices are far too sweet and do not provide enough sustainable energy for the length of the cleanse. The prices are much lower than competing purveyors but it is absolutely worth it to get a higher quality product than this company provides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Juice Cleanse that taste Good!
customer_reviews.text: I have juiced multiple times in the past but just discovered Suja Juice. It is amazing! The packing was great, kept cold with ice packs and good packaging material. The juices taste better than any other juice program that I've ever tried. And, the ingredients are fantastic and all organic. I will definitely order again and I am recommending to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesbettyj

customer_reviews.title: The juices don't taste bad but the amount is a lot for one day
customer_reviews.text: The juices don't taste bad but the amount is a lot for one day. Unless you are sitting at home with the juice in your hand the whole time, it is hard to complete. Also, the "dessert" one is fairly gross. The rest are good.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Allen

customer_reviews.title: Suja is great.
customer_reviews.text: The flavors are all delicious and fresh. Makes it easy to do the cleanse. Just finished my second cleanse using Suja, and will definitely do again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good cleanse, I lost 7 lbs and thought the juices tasted great!
customer_reviews.author: A. Prunuske

customer_reviews.title: Wow, I didn't think it would taste THIS bad.
customer_reviews.text: I think the cleanse worked, but wow, this stuff is disgusting...
customer_reviews.author: TAS

customer_reviews.title: Check the use by dates
customer_reviews.text: Check the use by dates when you receive your box. In my box there was a wide ranges of dates. To follow the program you really need to us by the date of the one that will expire first. I opened the box thinking I had time because saw 5/24 on some of the bottles. I was wrong. The dates ranged from 5/6, 5/17, 5/18, 5/24, 5/25. I couldn't follow exactly because juices that expired 5/6 without me realizing it. I should have looked more closely.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: She didn't finish them and didn't like a lot of the flavors. I thought the dessert one was good though.
customer_reviews.author: JerT81

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved these juices & the cleanse was so easy to do!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: Some are good, others not so much
customer_reviews.text: Some are good, others not so much. Really, to me, the one that's supposed to be for dessert is one of the worse ones. I can't say whether it actually cleansed me or not, but I wasn't hungry throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy duhart

customer_reviews.title: I really loved all of the flavors - except the dessert one
customer_reviews.text: I really loved all of the flavors - except the dessert one. I wouldn't order that one ... too sweet and not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lang

customer_reviews.title: but was a great kick start to a diet
customer_reviews.text: Not delicious, but was a great kick start to a diet.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, bad lead time
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but it took 2 more weeks than expected due to the fact that it was on back order.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Seriously a Great Cleanse
customer_reviews.text: I was recently diagnosed with Celia's and wanted to do a cleanse to help my body get back to abnormal. And this one was AMAZING! I followed the timeframe instructions included in the box and drank 8oz of water before and after each juice. The 1st day was the hardest as far as being hungry goes, but it was totally worth it. The bloating and general heaviness in my stomach was gone, and I felt so much better, more energy and slept better for sure. I will probably do this a few times a year to keep myself feeling good:)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Suja
customer_reviews.text: Obviously it's expensive, but I did feel great after the 3 days. Maybe it was all in my head, who knows? I just felt more clean. The first day was hard, I really wanted to eat something. After the first day I was fine. They actually taste pretty good too, just make sure you always drink them cold.
customer_reviews.author: ccc1718

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting!
customer_reviews.text: On day 2 of my juice cleanse and I feel great! I've lost 4 lbs of water weight. Haven't the urge to splurge on food like I have with other juice cleanses. Also this one tastes much much much better than other cleanses I've had! This is truly a great restart for me in my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Cho

customer_reviews.title: Don't count on vanilla cloud
customer_reviews.text: They didn't even include Fiji or vanilla cloud and they included two awful green ones reef and twelve essentials that taste horrid. They make me want to vomit. This is not pleasant at all. I wish they had included the ones they said they would in the actual cleanse.
customer_reviews.author: Carley Mackenzie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Good
customer_reviews.text: Of all the juice programs I've tried, this is the best tasting for sure. I've come to believe that juicing is actually not great for you. You can do your own research. There's better ways to achieve the desired results. Again imop only.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Choose another brand
customer_reviews.text: Not the best juice cleanse. I've never had ones you can't freeze so I was surprised when they'd leaked/exploded after freezing. Based on the picture I thought there were 6 a day, 18 total but I only received 15... the two green ones were pretty unbearable so I basically had 3 a day. I would do another juice cleanse but not this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed the flavors but I was hungry for the entire ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the flavors but I was hungry for the entire cleanse. I think the whole not eating anything would work for someone who doesn't work, pick up kids etc. I ate a salad on day 2 and 3 and that seemed to keep me satiated. I buy the juices and smoothies from whole foods regularly. They are good to keep you regular and supplement meals.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Mayes

customer_reviews.title: The Fresh Start experience was generally good, but I won't order again because the packaging ...
customer_reviews.text: The Fresh Start experience was generally good, but I won't order again because the packaging was unbelievably wasteful. The bottles came in a large box with a ton of styrofoam and several disposable ice packs. I felt sick throwing all of the packing materials into the garbage. Suja should make finding alternative packaging a top priority! This level of wastefulness is grossly inconsistent with Suja's brand image!
customer_reviews.author: L. Janssen

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanse
customer_reviews.text: This cleanse really works. I use this quarterly when I feel like I just need to flush out my body. Great taste and keeps me full. Only one I can do without is the beet one. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: DeenieL

customer_reviews.title: Great experience with this cleanse!
customer_reviews.text: My experience with this 3-day cleanse was great. I did it to see if it would help my stomach feel better, and it did. I love the convenience of it (no purchasing loads of produce, washing, juicing, clean-up... six times per day!). So it's convenient, the juices taste good (I love veggies, so to me they were good), they are organic, and the results are great. My stomach felt better after doing it (I had been having a lot of gastrointestinal issues), I did also lose some weight with it, although that's not what my goal was. It comes shipped in dry ice and everything was still quite cold. Two thumbs up for this 3-day juice cleanse!
customer_reviews.author: SheReads

customer_reviews.title: Great detox - would do again
customer_reviews.text: The juices were absolutely delicious and surprisingly kept me full throughout the day. My first day I couldn't even finish the last juice. Its not to say that I wasn't craving food, but in general I wasn't starving. I would definitely do the 3-day detox again.
customer_reviews.author: Georgette Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing about this product is the convenience of the premade juices; otherwise, I'll pass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleasantly surprise at how well balanced the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprise at how well balanced the flavors in the juices were. I have tried "green" juices previously and found them to be very unpalatable. Usually they were bitter and had too much of a celery flavor. The juices from Suja were a refreshing and delicious surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Decent but..
customer_reviews.text: I would say four of the juices were palatable while the rest I could not choke down. There was one with beets and celery that almost made me gag and I simply could not drink it. I didn't lose any weight but I did feel better after doing the cleanse. I'd recommend it if you wanted to feel lighter but you will still be hungry!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A really great product, however it took forever and arrived warm.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: I just couldn't do it.
customer_reviews.text: Some of these drinks don't taste great and aren't filling enough. Maybe not enough fiber. Some of them are yummy. But I just couldn't stick with it because it wasn't satisfying enough. I think juicing on your own is a much more satisfying way to go. Problem is that doing your own juices isn't nearly as convenient. But, it's worth it to me since I couldn't manage to stick with this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Awesome

customer_reviews.title: and the juices were not enough to satisfy me for an entire day
customer_reviews.text: Some juices were really hard to get down because of the taste, and the juices were not enough to satisfy me for an entire day. I got very weak and light headed and had to eat solid foods half way through
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Nice Energy Boost
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying a juice cleanse. The first day started off a little rough, but the benefits were well worth it in the end. The most noticeable benefit for me was the energy boost I experienced through the cleanse, as well as several days beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanse!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these. I noticed some reviewers were upset over the taste, well...when the ingredients are celery, kale, etc, the juice will taste like that. I thought the juices were not only tolerable but very good considering how heavy they are on the green veggie side of things. Loved how I felt drinking these, and loved the convenience of it all and variety throughout each day. If you are hoping for fruit juice, this won't taste like that, but it will taste like apple juice with celery, kale, etc, and it is worth it. I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Peashy

customer_reviews.title: All juices had great flavor & consistency
customer_reviews.text: All juices had great flavor & consistency. They gave me energy & kept me full throughout the day. The blue dream was a nice treat at night. I will definitely purchase this again & recommend it to those looking for a healthy start or reset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: very delicious tasting, def buy it to cleanse or for regular drinking.....
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Z

customer_reviews.title: Great juice cleanse, no fuss
customer_reviews.text: Came earlier than anticipated. The juices taste great. For those that commented that they don't taste good, it may be that you aren't used to juicing....don't expect it to taste like orange juice or Sunny Delight because it's primarily vegetables, not fruit. You could make this yourself, but all the correct fresh ingredients would be expensive. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It made my first juicing experience easy and gave me a fresh start to a healthier ...
customer_reviews.text: It was very tasty and kept me full throughout the day. Plus its a program you can eat raw foods if you need to have a little more in your stomach. I was able to complete the 3 days without any solid foods while being quite active throughout those days. It made my first juicing experience easy and gave me a fresh start to a healthier lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: gotta have it

customer_reviews.title: The Worst Tasting Juice I have Ever Tasted !!
customer_reviews.text: Only the Blue Dream and Green Supreme are palatable...I will start day 3 of the fast tomorrow... this is the worse tasting juice I have EVER had...Not looking forward to the last day, but I am determined to stick it out !! Good luck to others at getting this product down !!
customer_reviews.author: lory volk

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't able to make it past the second day - they didn't taste horrible but I wasn't able to tolerate a juice cleanse. I'm sticking to probiotics and clean eating! Might work for some people though, my husband enjoyed the ones I couldn't finish :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeni55

customer_reviews.title: Tasty juice and an easy cleanse
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty juice and an easy way to schedule and complete a cleanse. It was almost too much for me to finish all 6 juices every day! I think that the ease and convience make up for the cost since I do not have the time or space to juice all of the ingredients needed to create 6 juices a day for 3 days in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Clover Girl

customer_reviews.title: They do make you feel good, and the ingredients are good
customer_reviews.text: These are just okay. They cost WAY TOO MUCH for something I can make in my own juicer. They do make you feel good, and the ingredients are good, but the cost is too high for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K. Root

customer_reviews.title: eh- okay, has some qualities of a 5, and some other qualities of a lower score
customer_reviews.text: Its okay. I mean, the tastes are not as pleasing I imagined. The convenience factor of not having to juice myself, grocery shop etc, is a 5. Deliver and quality is a 5. I love all veggies, but this just wan't satisfying. Good variety juices for the day, but I would never do three days of this again. Eh. The taste was something I dreaded looking forward to. I nearly wanted to starve instead. I have done my own juicing for years. I would endure this for a one day only. I think its a tad overpriced too.
customer_reviews.author: Witchhighlander

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!!
customer_reviews.text: Items are as described. Shipped within 3 days of ordering, and I received it 2 days later via UPS 2-day Air. The juices are cold and have a few days until they expire. That's how good real juices are - THEY EXPIRE QUICKLY. All of the reviews talking about the too soon expiration date... Then go and buy your processed juices from the store, and good luck with that! :) I've had Suja before, and all of the juices are pretty good. I am excited to start this to reset my mind before Xmas!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My favorite juices to being with. I don't do the hardcore pure Suja cleanse. I splash in my own juices and smoothies. but I use these basically whenever I'm lazy to make juices. I fulfilled a 10 day cleanse, with the assistance of these. Great value. highly recommend it! But don't buy this and anticipate instant weight lost, remember. You have to exercise, stay dedicate, and dont cheat your diet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I love the simple smoothness of these drinks. And the packaging is quite good (albeit appropriate for the cost). Neverthless, I think this is an expensive purchase and somewhat exorbitant. I can't explain why some of the drinks lack sufficient vitamin content considering what they are made of. I still like the drinks after exercise (first discovered at my gym in Cali this summer)--but are they healthy? I don't know
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it was ok. I went back to my Vitamix and juicer. Too expensive but decent taste. It's not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Oso916

customer_reviews.title: Celery is my personal hell
customer_reviews.text: I tried to make it through this juice cleanse a few times. I never made it past the second juice for the day. I would always get a terrible migraine that absolutely would not go away without food and medicine. Aside from that, if you don't like celery, DO NOT do this cleanse. I've always hated celery, but recently got to a point where I could stand it. Celery is in almost every juice in this cleanse, and that is all that those juices taste like. All said and done, I ended up wasting a lot of money on a bunch of juice that ultimately ended up being poured down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: The taste of the juices were terrible. The only one that was palatable was the ...
customer_reviews.text: The taste of the juices were terrible. The only one that was palatable was the cloud drink. I wish I never bought them. I do not like celery and 4 out of the 6 juices contain celery. I couldn't stand the tastes so most of them I had to throw away. I'm dissatisfied because I bought 3 orders and feel it was a waste of money. I much prefer the naked and odwalla drinks because they are loaded with flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

product_meta.title: Suja Organic Cold-Pressed Juice, 3 Day Fresh Start Pack, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 21), Plant-Powered Vegetable and Fruit Juices, Vegan, Gluten-free, Non-GMO, Made in USA
product_meta.description:
Suja’s NEW 3-Day Cleanse includes 7 juices plus a hearty breakfast each day, front-loading your calories to reduce feelings of hunger to help you get through the program successfully. Shortly before starting, we recommend eliminating caffeine, dairy, alcohol, red meats and sweets and increasing your intake of fruit, veggies and whole grains, making your transition into the program much easier! customer will receive 21, 12 ounce bottles

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




What to Expect from Suja’s 3-Day Fresh Start  Going from fish tacos to juice? Be gentle. Start eating light, plant-based foods and hit pause on highly oily, fatty, sugary, or processed foods a few days before you begin. Expect 18 juices, 6 per day all packed with organic planty goodness. What will they taste like? Blend up some fresh celery, cucumber and kale and you might get an idea. And don’t expect sugar – because we didn’t add any. Will you be hungry? Yes. Yes, you will. But if you need to cheat a little, we won’t tell – just keep it light, like veggies (yup, can’t have enough) and nuts. Plus, drink lots of water. Why, again, are you doing this? Plants have power and you should, too. We’ve bottled the best of them so you can chug celery to aid in digestion (everybody poops), beets to improve blood flow (also helps with skin radiance) and cayenne to jump start your metabolism (yes, please). 

From Cold-Pressed Kale to Collards to Cucumbers to Carrots, we’ve got you covered Curious how we make green chard chuggable? Simple is not our middle name. Bryan, our totally hipster head chef, works up concoctions using the highest quality fruits and vegetables that contain vital nutrients your body needs (and wants), like amino acids, antioxidants, proteins & omegas. Then basically the entire office taste-tests until we fall into a “we’re not worthy” appreciation of the winning creation. Because we’re just a bunch of plant-obsessed people who believe filling your body with clean, organic fruits and veggies increases the chances of having a long, fun-filled life (oh, and also vibrant health and well-being). Now go on – drink plants and feel their power.




Organic Organic produce is grown without the use of pesticides, synthetic fertilizers, sewage sludge, genetically modified organisms, ionizing radiation or bioengineering.

Non-GMO GMOs, or “genetically modified organisms,” are plants or animals that have been genetically modified or artificially engineered. The Non-GMO Project believes that consumers in North America should have access to clearly labeled Non-GMO food and products.

Cold-Pressured Cold Pressure, also known as High Pressure Processing (HPP), is used instead of high heat, to extends shelf life and help maintain essential vitamins, minerals and enzymes.




With a wide range of Cold-Pressed, Organic offerings, Suja has a juice for every lifestyle We believe living food makes us feel more alive and if you have to remember to eat your vegetables, you haven’t tasted ours! 




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Organic. Cold-Pressed. Non-GMO.

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

Suja’s story all began from a shared dream to help people everywhere transform their lives through conscious nutrition. Co-Founder Annie Lawless had been juicing her entire life and from a young age had been aware that what you put in your body affects how you look and more importantly, how you feel. Her friend Eric Ethans had a background as a raw food chef and spent his entire life researching and pairing ingredients to create healthy, delicious meals. The two met in San Diego and bonded over their mutual love of delivering convenient nutrition through foods and beverages that also tasted good. They were frustrated by the lack of pure, organic products on grocery store shelves and decided to create their own juices at home. Meanwhile, James Brennan, a leading hospitality visionary, award-winning restaurateur and one of San Diego’s most successful entrepreneurs, met Eric and was instantly hooked on his homemade juice. Enter Jeff Church, a Harvard MBA and successful social entrepreneur, known for his role as founder and CEO of Nika Water, a social enterprise that donates 100 percent of its profits to clean water projects and poverty alleviation around the world. The rest is history: Co-founders Annie, Eric, James and Jeff came together to form Suja Juice as we know it today, with a mission to get the best quality organic and Non-GMO juice into as many hands as possible. 

What makes your product special?

At Suja, we believe that best-quality, clean juice is a grocery not a luxury. We’re talking cold-pressed, always organic, never (ever) GMO, chemical-free, filler-free, gluten-free, preservative-free, juice without the junk. Because if it’s not all of those things, it’s not worth it. 

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

Suja is on a mission to get an organic juice into as many hands as possible. Only 4% of US food sales is of organic products and yet in a recent poll, 45% of the US population reported actively trying to add organic foods and beverages to their diets. Since launching in 2012, Suja has sourced over 75 million pounds of organic produce. And ranked #1 in Inc. Magazine’s 500 Fastest Growing Food & Beverage Companies as well as Forbes #2 Most Promising Companies, Suja is well on its way to democratizing organics.
feature_bullets: New front loaded calorie approach to help with satiation and prevent bingeing or failing the program due to hunger.
Created in partnership with a licensed naturopathic doctor
Designed for those wanting to maintain a healthy lifestyle
USDA CERTIFIED: Organic & Non-GMO Project Verified, Kosher Certified, Dairy, soy and gluten-free.
NO ARTIFICIAL SWEETENERS: Our organic sweeteners are derived strictly from the fresh squeezed juices of our organic fruits and vegetables. No added sweeteners in our products!
